sentences.sContent: The door had been locked from the inside.
The jewels were locked away inside the safe.
A full report is expected inside three months.
sentences.sCn: 完整的报告要在三个月内完成。

phrases.pCn: adv. 在里面；在内心；知道内情

words.tran: 内部的人，会员；熟悉内情者

trans.tranOther: the inner part of something, which is surrounded or hidden by the outer part

trans.tranCn: 里面的；内部的；秘密的；内幕的
trans.tranOther: in or facing the inner part of something
in or into a container or other closed space so as to be completely covered or surrounded
in less than a particular amount of time
